name: Riddle of the Sphinx: An Egyptian Adventure
name_original: Riddle of the Sphinx: An Egyptian Adventure
description:
Riddle of the Sphinx: An Egyptian Adventure is an adventure game developed by Omni Creative Group. It came out on 11-12-2000. It was published by The Adventure Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Riddle of the Sphinx: An Egyptian Adventure on PC.
